post:
We are a Xen VPS and Shared Cloud Hosting provider.
You can find us at [vpsnodebox.com](http://www.vpsnodebox.com)

Because most people don’t have time to read to many details about the products that they are interested in, we have created a very short video that explains what we are all about.
You can see our video here: [youtube.com/watch?v=FdBNCTr_LWw&feature=plcp](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FdBNCTr_LWw&feature=plcp)

We have created a special promotion for the community here on LowEndTalk. Just use promo code LET at checkout and you will get our VPS 512 package for $6.99 / month for life (yes, it's recurring). On top of that, we have another promotion for all of our packages that takes off up to 65% for life (recurring) off any of our hosting packages, VPS or Shared Cloud Hosting.

Package details:
**VPS 512**
Virtualization Platform: Xen
CPU Cores: 4 (8 Threads)
Guaranteed RAM: 512MB
RAID Disk Space: 24GB
Bandwidth: 200GB
Network Speed: 100 Mbit
Dedicated IP Addresses: 1
Control Panel: SolusVM
Monthly Cost: $6.99 / month

Direct order link: [https://portal.vpsnodebox.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2](https://portal.vpsnodebox.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

More info about us: [vpsnodebox.com/about-us](http://www.vpsnodebox.com/about-us)
Test IP: 108.170.27.131
Test files:
[vpsnodenox.com/10mb-test.bin](http://www.vpsnodenox.com/10mb-test.bin)
[vpsnodenox.com/100mb-test.bin](http://www.vpsnodenox.com/100mb-test.bin)
[vpsnodenox.com/1000mb-test.bin](http://www.vpsnodenox.com/1000mb-test.bin)
Physical Server Location: Phoenix, AZ

In case you are wondering how long we have been in business, we started back in December of 2011 under the name Toratek .NET. Our About Us page offers more in depth information about what we do.

Thank you, and we hope to see many of you!
